email.subject: Thank you for returning my file.
email.body:
Thank you for returning my file #PLAYERNAME#,
You've done the right thing, returned to me what was wrongfully stolen. But I'm sorry, you know too much and I cannot let you roam free any longer. This is goodbye from me, this is probably the last time we will ever talk... I'm sorry, but it had to be this way.
I can't have anything linking back to me...
